heroSubtitle: Nutritionist, Nutrition Coach, Prevent Age Specialist
heroCTA: Vitalize your balance, find harmony with Dr. Vira Boichuk!
featureTitle: Discover the path to harmony of body and soul!
featureDescription: You are unique, and your health is a priceless treasure. Together we will create a personalized roadmap to comfortable well-being, natural fitness, and vitality. Experience, understanding, and a personalized approach - this is what awaits you in the world of healthy eating. Take the first step towards a better version of yourself - full of energy and self-confidence. Start changing today - weight will no longer matter. The main thing is self-love and enjoying every moment of life!

profile.name: Vira Boichuk
profile.title: Experienced physician, clinical dietitian, and nutritionist

features.name: Education:
features.description: Graduated from Ivano-Frankivsk National Medical University in 2009 with a degree in Internal Medicine. Gained practical experience as a therapist in a city hospital and later as an assistant and associate professor at the Family Medicine department. In 2016, successfully defended her thesis on the role of intestinal hormones and pepsinogens in the development of gastroesophageal reflux disease combined with endemic goiter in iodine-deficient conditions.

In 2020, specialized in clinical dietetics at the P.L. Shupyk National Medical Academy in Kyiv. Since then, Vira Boichuk has been consulting patients as a certified dietitian, nutritionist, and anti-aging specialist in Ukraine, Europe, and the USA.
Vira Boichuk promotes an individualized approach to each patient and a holistic view of health as a harmony of body and soul, with a positive lifestyle.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Spectrum of Nutrition Services
services.description: Find your ideal healthy eating plan among personalized programs and expert guidance

features.name: Online Consultation - The First Step to Change!
description: Detailed analysis of tests and eating habits
Individual nutrition and healthy lifestyle recommendations
Selection of vitamins and supplements if necessary
PDF guide and sample one-day menu

features.name: Comprehensive Program 'Balanced Menu'
description: Thorough health analysis and your body's needs
Development of a 7-day menu considering all preferences

features.name: Monthly Support - Path to Long-Term Results
description: Individual action plan to achieve your goals
4-week menu with the possibility of adjustments
Daily communication via text with answers to questions and control of the situation
Weekly calls with mini-lectures and answers to questions
Weekly lecture calls to deepen your knowledge
Access to useful materials on nutrition

features.name: Whatever program you choose, Vira's professional support will ensure your confidence on the path to ideal health!

testimonials.sectionTitle: Worked with wonderful clients of various ages and lifestyles

testimonialsList.name: Oleh
testimonialsList.title: 29 years
testimonialsList.quote: As someone who struggled with high acidity, I was skeptical about changing my diet. It seemed easier to rely on medication like Omeprazole. However, working with Vira Boichuk transformed my approach to health. Initially, the transition was challenging - meal prep, frequent grocery trips, and making healthier choices felt overwhelming. But Vira`s guidance and constant support kept me motivated.

testimonialsList.name: Oksana
testimonialsList.title: 33 years
testimonialsList.quote: After having my baby, I had a hard time getting back to a healthy weight. Working with Vira Boychuk was a turning point. Her holistic approach covered everything from vitamins and hydration to proper nutrition and sleep hygiene. Under Vera's guidance, I lost 7 kg and completely changed my attitude to food.

blog.sectionSubtitle: Here I share interesting articles, resources...

posts.title: Planet-first diet cuts risk of early death by nearly a third
posts.description: Closely following a planet-friendly diet of mostly fruits, vegetables and whole grains reduces the risk of premature death by nearly one-third in people, while also dramatically cutting the release of greenhouse gases devastating the planet.

posts.title: Avocados may play a beneficial role in diabetes management and prevention.
posts.description: Research indicates that regular avocado consumption is associated with a lower risk of developing type 2 diabetes, particularly among women.

posts.title: Regularly eating avocado linked to lower diabetes risk in women
posts.description: A recent study from Mexico links avocado consumption with a lower diabetes risk. Image credit: Tatiana Maksimova/Getty Images.
